item.title: Building Sphericle - Part 1
item.description: What I learned changing the way the world learns geography.

item.title: Hello, World
item.description: I’ve launched a personal website! But you’re here, so you already knew that. Why now? When I was a kid, I got obsessed with the book A Big Ball of String by Marion Holland. It tells the story of a boy sick in bed and unable to do much. He finds that with his big ball of string, he can do almost anything by tying string to the object he wants to control.
